text: Ara tomara prabhu bidhana karechena -- tamke chara tomara an'yera upasana karo na, ara pitamatara prati sadbyabahara. Yadi tomadera samane tadera ekajana ba ubhaye bardhakye paumchoya tabu'o tadera prati''ahâ€™â€™ balo na, ara tadera tiraskara karo na, baram tadera prati balabe binayanamra katha.
